items.title: Holaglow
items.subtitle: Digital platform for management and sales in aesthetic clinics
items.shortDescription: Development of the corporate website, internal CRM and sales tool for aesthetic clinics
items.description: Holaglow is a startup with several aesthetic clinics specialized in treatments like Botox and other advanced beauty services. The project involved the complete development of a digital system consisting of a corporate website, an appointment scheduling tool for managing medical availability, and an internal sales application (Dashboard). This application manages appointments, automated WhatsApp messages and client notifications, and integrates with the external Flowww system to optimize calendars, treatments and resources. As a Fullstack Developer, I participated in the system architecture, frontend development with Next.js and Tailwind CSS, and backend with .NET. One of the main technical challenges was scaling the system and building a custom gateway to add specific functionalities not provided by the third-party system, especially for treatments with particular requirements. The project was developed by a team with strong focus on efficiency and continuous improvement of the clinics' internal processes.
items.metaTitle: Holaglow CRM and sales tool for aesthetic clinics | Development with Next.js and .NET
items.metaDescription: Discover the Holaglow project: a comprehensive digital platform for aesthetic clinics, with CRM, appointment management, notifications and sales tool. Developed with Next.js, Tailwind and .NET.

items.title: Okron
items.subtitle: A new generation of intelligent CMMS integrated with AI, WhatsApp and real-time plant control.
items.shortDescription: Intelligent CMMS for SMEs: incident management, inventory and orders with AI and WhatsApp.
items.description: Okron is a maintenance management tool (CMMS) designed to optimize the operation of industrial plants and businesses with technical needs. With an intuitive and usability-focused interface, it manages incidents, schedules maintenance, controls spare parts inventory and places orders with suppliers - even via WhatsApp. Integrated with AI and its own chatbot, Okron automates key processes and easily adapts to third-party systems, offering a scalable and robust solution for both SMEs and larger environments. As CTO, I led the technical development, creating the system architecture, web platform and mobile app from scratch with a clear focus on scalability and smart integrations.
items.metaTitle: Okron CMMS - Maintenance Management with AI, WhatsApp and intelligent control
items.metaDescription: Discover Okron, the intelligent CMMS for SMEs: manage incidents, inventory and orders with artificial intelligence and WhatsApp integration.

items.title: AI ChatBot
items.subtitle: A ChatGPT connected to your database
items.shortDescription: AI chatbot integrated with client's database to answer queries automatically and efficiently.
items.description: This project consists of developing an intelligent chatbot that connects directly to a client's database to extract, interpret and display relevant information through a conversation interface. Implemented with React, Python and artificial intelligence, the system allows natural language queries and provides clear answers, improving internal data accessibility and operational efficiency. It was designed with security, scalability and flexibility in mind, allowing easy adaptation to different data structures and sectors.
